title: What are the tenets of realism? - Quora

response.answer_text: We spend most of out life doing what is necessary to maintain our lives.  A large part of the disposable time is spent in dressed up versions of nest material acquisition, and reproductive drive.   Some of the rest of time-energy is actually spent using the enhanced human abilities like communication, cooperation, cogitation, coaching. Those times can have animal drive concepts mixed in, or they can be relatively pure humanism. The relatively pure humanism can enhanced by the following five points. 1. Keep your brain in the game. Nam2.You are unique, and so is every other being. Myoho3. Being unique does not mean you can live well all by yourself.4. What goes around comes around. Renge5. Lives change, and Life goes on. Kyo The Nam Myho Renge Kyo are the Japanese pronunciation of the Chinese words that summarize points 1 throug 5. If you forget any one of those, you will have collisions with reality. If you never forget any one of them, you will win more often. wilrang88OrWilliam Who controls you?
